title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.14 - Vehicles subject to detention for nonpayment of parking charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1262.14 - Vehicles subject to detention for nonpayment of parking charges

State Regulations

The manager shall have authority to detain vehicles
parked in vehicular parking areas operated by the Port Authority, for
nonpayment of parking charges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1262.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
